divs: Sighting DetailsEvery morning around 4-5:30am a very bright light shines in the south western area of detroit--towards ann arbor and farther south. At first I passed it off as a plane but it would hover for a long time. One time it was there about 1am, and after hovering in the sky it fly over the home and I then thought it must be a big plane. Then thought there are no aircrafts allowed to fly at 1 in the morning. I have been getting up every morning to see if it is there and it is. Very strange. This has been going on for about two weeks.
Summary: there has been a bright light shining for a few hours every single night between 4-5:30am. At first I thought it was a star...but it moved and then stayed still...then moved again.
